column5: I hope no one gets their panties in a bunch over this. This is not an excuse to speed while driving it is just for information as to where speedtraps are located  http://www.speedtrap.org  Gerritt.
It is so.  But thanks for the info.  See you on Saturday?
Wow that is a neat website......intresting, I never knew there was any such thing.
Hi douG,  Yes I will be there for sure.. I just confirmed with Kelvin.  See you guys then!  Gerritt.
Here's another site with some good info  Fight your tickets!
I just looked my town Guelph and every speed trap there is right on the money.    cool.
